titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 34.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the enrollment of H.R. 34.

action.text: Mr. Lance asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

vote.text: On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Mr. Upton asked unanimous consent that the House agree to the Senate amendment.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 34 (21st Century Cures Act) to change the: (1) section heading for section 1001 to "Beau Biden Cancer Moonshot and NIH Innovation Projects," and (2) official title to "An Act to accelerate the discovery, development, and delivery of 21st century cures, and for other purposes."
